languages.text: {n}Высокий фактотум склоняется в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, минуту вашего драгоценного внимания! С превеликим удовольствием я хочу сообщить о прибытии на ваше судно делегации высоких экклезиархов Адептус Министорум. Святейшие слуги Его прибыли, дабы засвидетельствовать свое почтение перед богобоязненным и верным слову Его Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокий Фактотум склоняется в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, минуту вашего драгоценного внимания! С превеликим удовольствием я хочу сообщить о прибытии на ваше судно делегации высоких экклезиархов Адептус Министорум. Святейшие слуги Его прибыли, дабы засвидетельствовать свое почтение перед богобоязненным и верным слову Его Вольным Торговцем".

languages.text: {n}The High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if I may beg for a minute of your precious attention! I am elated to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. The holiest of His servants have come to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader, faithful to His word and fearful of His wrath."
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий фактотум склоняется в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, минуту вашего драгоценного внимания! С превеликим удовольствием я хочу сообщить о прибытии на ваше судно делегации высоких экклезиархов Адептус Министорум. Святейшие слуги Его прибыли, дабы засвидетельствовать свое почтение перед богобоязненным и верным слову Его Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: {n}High Factotum pays you a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, just a minute of your precious attention! It is a great joy for me to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of Adeptus Ministorum has arrived to your vessel. The holiest of His servants have arrived in order to testify their veneration before the Rogue Trader, fearful and faithful to His words."

It is a great joy for me to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of Adeptus Ministorum has arrived to your vessel. The holiest of His servants have arrived in order to testify their veneration before the Rogue Trader, fearful and faithful to His words."

It is a great joy for me to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. Faithful to His will and fearful of His wrath, the holiest of His servants have arrived in order to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader."

{n}High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, just a minute of your precious attention! It is a great joy for me to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. Faithful to His will and fearful of His wrath, the holiest of His servants have arrived in order to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader."

{n}The High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if I may beg for a minute of your precious attention! I am elated to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. The holiest of His servants have come to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader, faithful to His word and fearful of His wrath."

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问向你深鞠一躬。{/n}“大人，请允许我占用您一点点宝贵时间！我非常荣幸地通知您，国教教会的高级教长代表团已经抵达您的舰船。那些教长都是神皇最神圣的仆人，忠于祂的旨意，畏惧祂的愤怒。他们来到您的船上，希望能在行商浪人面前亲自致敬。”
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if I may beg for a minute of your precious attention! I am elated to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. The holiest of His servants have come to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader, faithful to His word and fearful of His wrath."

traits.locale_text: {n}高阶顾问向你深鞠一躬。{/n}“大人，请允许我占用您一点点宝贵时间！我非常荣幸地通知您，国教教会的高级教长代表团已经抵达您的舰船。那些教长都是神皇最神圣的仆人，忠于祂的旨意，畏惧祂的愤怒。他们来到您的船上，希望能在行商浪人面前亲自致敬。”

languages.text: {n}Le haut factotum vous adresse une profonde révérence.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, auriez-vous l'amabilité de m'accorder une minute de votre temps ? J'ai la joie de vous annoncer qu'une délégation de hauts ecclésiastiques de l'Adeptus Ministorum vient de se présenter sur votre vaisseau. Fidèles à Sa divine parole et redoutant Sa sainte colère, Ses plus pieux serviteurs sont venus assurer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de leur adoration. »
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if I may beg for a minute of your precious attention! I am elated to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. The holiest of His servants have come to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader, faithful to His word and fearful of His wrath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le haut factotum vous adresse une profonde révérence.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, auriez-vous l'amabilité de m'accorder une minute de votre temps ? J'ai la joie de vous annoncer qu'une délégation de hauts ecclésiastiques de l'Adeptus Ministorum vient de se présenter sur votre vaisseau. Fidèles à Sa divine parole et redoutant Sa sainte colère, Ses plus pieux serviteurs sont venus assurer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de leur adoration. »

languages.text: {n}ハイ・ファクトタムは深々と礼をする。{/n}「陛下、少しばかり貴重なお時間をいただいてよろしいでしょうか！帝国宗務局の高僧たちの代表団が船に到着いたしましたことを、喜んでお知らせさせていただきます。かのお方の僕たる者たちが、聖なる御言葉に忠実なる自由開拓者への畏敬を表明するため、かのお方の言葉に忠実であり、その怒りを恐れる者として、やって来たのでございます」
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if I may beg for a minute of your precious attention! I am elated to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. The holiest of His servants have come to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader, faithful to His word and fearful of His wrath."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハイ・ファクトタムは深々と礼をする。{/n}「陛下、少しばかり貴重なお時間をいただいてよろしいでしょうか！帝国宗務局の高僧たちの代表団が船に到着いたしましたことを、喜んでお知らせさせていただきます。かのお方の僕たる者たちが、聖なる御言葉に忠実なる自由開拓者への畏敬を表明するため、かのお方の言葉に忠実であり、その怒りを恐れる者として、やって来たのでございます」

languages.text: {n}El Sumo Factótum se inclina ante ti.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, le ruego que me permita un momento de su valioso tiempo! Es un gran orgullo para mí poder informarle de que una delegación de eclesiarcas de alto rango del Adeptus Ministorum ha venido a su nave. Los más santos de los sirvientes del Emperador han acudido para proclamar su admiración por usted como Comerciante Independiente fiel a sus palabras y temeros{mf|o|a} de su ira».
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if I may beg for a minute of your precious attention! I am elated to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. The holiest of His servants have come to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader, faithful to His word and fearful of His wrath."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Sumo Factótum se inclina ante ti.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, le ruego que me permita un momento de su valioso tiempo! Es un gran orgullo para mí poder informarle de que una delegación de eclesiarcas de alto rango del Adeptus Ministorum ha venido a su nave. Los más santos de los sirvientes del Emperador han acudido para proclamar su admiración por usted como Comerciante Independiente fiel a sus palabras y temeros{mf|o|a} de su ira».

languages.text: {n}Das Hoch-Faktotum verneigt sich tief vor dir.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, nur eine Minute Eurer kostbaren Zeit! Es ist mir eine große Freude, Euch in Kenntnis zu setzen, dass eine Delegation hochrangiger Ekklesiarchen des Adeptus Ministorum auf Eurem Schiff eingetroffen ist. Die heiligsten seiner Diener sind gekommen, um {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ihre Ehrerbietung zu erweisen, seinem Willen treu ergeben und seinen Zorn fürchtend."
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if I may beg for a minute of your precious attention! I am elated to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. The holiest of His servants have come to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader, faithful to His word and fearful of His wrath."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Hoch-Faktotum verneigt sich tief vor dir.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, nur eine Minute Eurer kostbaren Zeit! Es ist mir eine große Freude, Euch in Kenntnis zu setzen, dass eine Delegation hochrangiger Ekklesiarchen des Adeptus Ministorum auf Eurem Schiff eingetroffen ist. Die heiligsten seiner Diener sind gekommen, um {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ihre Ehrerbietung zu erweisen, seinem Willen treu ergeben und seinen Zorn fürchtend."

languages.text: {n}Arşıkâhya, ayaklarına kapanıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, değerli dikkatinizi bir dakikalığına bana verebilir misiniz? Adeptus Ministorum'un yüksek ekleşiarklarından oluşan bir heyetin geminize ulaştığını bildirmekten mutluluk duyarım. O'nun en kutsal hizmetkârları, O'nun kelamına sadık ve gazabından korkan Hür Tacir'e saygılarını sunmaya gelmiş bulunuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum bows low to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if I may beg for a minute of your precious attention! I am elated to notify you that a delegation of high ecclesiarchs of the Adeptus Ministorum has arrived at your vessel. The holiest of His servants have come to proclaim their veneration before the Rogue Trader, faithful to His word and fearful of His wrath."
